level.heading: NOTICE OF UTILITY CHARGE PAID BY TENANT (ยง 15-410)

level.text: The utility company shall submit to the owner a monthly listing of the utility charges made by those tenants who have elected to receive service in their own name. The tenant shall be authorized to reduce his or her rent payment to the owner by an amount equal to the utility charge. The owner shall have no recourse for collecting the amount of rent so reduced from the tenant.
